review:
My grandson is 2.5 years having cold & cough but no relief even after 5 days treatment. Congratulation deteriorated with more frequent coughing & sputum in throat. He was given only relent syrup. Child could not sleep whole night & condition is worse. He was also prescribed tulsi, honey & turmeric? Can a child take this?
Highly dissatisfied with his treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is an amazing child doctor, with great patience and almost care, he always ensure to understand the child problem than just giving medicine, many times he decline to prescribe instead suggested natural healing and immunity builyprocess

review:
I know Dr. Srinath from 20 years now, We used to go to him for both of my sons medical needs. Very nice doctor and his medicines are most safe . He is very cool and very quick in diagnosing the problems.

We feel very safe and assured when we go to him. My elder son is 20 yrs now and younger one is 10 yrs.

I highly recommend Dr. Srinath
